definition: (modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise)/...right?/...OK?/...I presume.
bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]

sentences.english: In the restroom sof that cybercafe, dad connected to mom.
sentences.chinese: 在網吧衛生間兩人打到一坨。

sentences.english: Mr. Wang worked in an Internet bar.

sentences.english: First, the heavy blows against the black bars, focus on maintenance of cultural market order.
sentences.chinese: 一是出重拳打擊黑網吧，着力維護文化市場經營秩序。

sentences.english: Recently, more than six thousand students guaranteed that they would be far away from net bars in Jinzhou city, Liaoning Province.
sentences.chinese: 最近，遼寧省錦州市六千多名學生保證遠離網吧。

sentences.english: One box tropical fish is raised in the Internet bar, raise a flower that can catch mouse to spend a cat even.
sentences.chinese: 網吧裏養一箱熱帶魚，甚至養一條能捉老鼠的花花貓。

sentences.english: Finally, Liu and Xiao Yu went to the Internet cafe and they were still back to back this time.
sentences.chinese: 最後，劉冰和小雨又去網吧上網聊天，依然是背對背。

sentences.english: The administrative department of industry and commerce with the ban "black bars."
sentences.chinese: 積極配合工商行政管理部門查處取締“黑網吧”。

sentences.english: In the top right-hand corner, there is a grinding shop.
sentences.chinese: 餐館從網吧繞過拐角就是。

sentences.english: Turtle field in the Internet to find a laptop, but still cant open treasure box.
sentences.chinese: 龜田在網吧裏找到一臺筆記本，但還是打不開寶物箱。

sentences.english: Many towns and cities have cybercafes where you can surf the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 許多城鎮都有網吧，在那兒人們可以在網上衝浪。

sentences.english: These Internet cafes and one of the most serious problem is to allow minors access.
sentences.chinese: 這些黑網吧最嚴重的問題之一是允許未成年人上網。

sentences.english: I eat lunch box in the Internet bar, is China"s starch, and then begin typing."
sentences.chinese: 我在網吧裏喫着盒飯，是中國的小炒，而後着手打字。

sentences.english: They hang out on the street and go to the internet café.
sentences.chinese: 不然，他們就在街上亂逛，或者去網吧。

sentences.english: Internet cafe owners to actively launch the report "Internet cafes" to intensify the crackdown.
sentences.chinese: 發動各網吧業主積極舉報“黑網吧”，加大打擊力度。

sentences.chinese: 發動各網吧業主積極舉報“黑網吧”，加大打擊力度。

sentences.english: Group photo of the schoolgirl beauties and their male boss.
sentences.chinese: 網吧制服美眉和他們的老闆的合影。

definition: to play/to have fun/to hang out
to wander/to roam about/to loaf about/to be idle
online game/abbr. for 網絡遊戲|网络游戏
to go online/to connect to the Internet/(of a document etc) to be uploaded to the Internet/(tennis, volleyball etc) to move in close to the net
to leave home (to live somewhere else)
to close a door/to lock a door/(of a shop etc) to close (for the night, or permanently)
what are you doing?/whatever for?/why on earth?
